products.name: Alfajor
products.description: Pastry strips filled with dulce de leche

products.name: Berliner
products.description: Berliner Pfannkuchen is a traditional North German-Central European pastry similar to a doughnut with no central hole made from sweet yeast dough fried in fat or oil

products.name: Charlotte
products.description: A type of trifle that can be served hot or cold. It can also be known as an ice-box cake

products.name: Bigoli
products.description: Thick, softer, spaghetti-like pasta. Made with whole wheat rather than durum

products.name: Fettucine
products.description: Ribbon of pasta approximately 6.5 millimeters wide. Larger and thicker than tagliatelle

products.name: Mafalde
products.description: Long rectangular ribbons with ruffled sides

products.name: Avocado
products.description: The avocado (Persea americana), a tree with probable origin in South Central Mexico, is classified as a member of the flowering plant family Lauraceae
